transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Patel sir, Sonal this side, IndiaMART se.
Customer: Ha.
Executive: Sir, maine, main aapko whatsapp bhej rahi hu, maine proposal bhi bhej diya hai. Aap ek baar check kar lijiyega. Usme TDS katne ke baad ₹96000 hi bach rahe hain jo do part mein hum de sakte hain.
Customer: Theek hai main ek baar actual mein mera ek auction chal raha hai main aapko 6:30 baje tak mera ending time hai fir main aapse ek baar aur call kar lunga nahi to fir main kal aapko laga lunga 11 baje tak.
Executive: Haan matlab aur zaruri nahi hai, hume ye payment abhi karni hai, hum ye December mein bhi kar sakte hain. It's just ki aapko information chahiye tha.
Customer: Ji ji ji ji. Main aapko thodi der mein aage reh ke call back kar lunga agar nahi connect hota hai to main aapko kal subah laga lunga.
Executive: Koi dikkat nahi hai aap apne hisab se kar lena. Maine aapko isiliye detail mail pe bhi dal diya hai taki aap jab time mile to dekh lena fursat mein.
Customer: Ji ji.
Executive: Whatsapp pe bhi dal du?
Customer: Haan dal dijiye.
Executive: Chaliye theek hai whatsapp pe bhi dal deti hu ek baar. Theek hai sir. Thank you.
Customer: Ji. Thank you. Thank you so much.
summary:
Concerns:

- Executive sent proposal, ₹96000 remaining after TDS deduction.

- Customer has an auction going on.



Resolution:

- Customer will check the proposal later.

- Executive agreed to send details on WhatsApp.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will call back later or tomorrow.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- proposal, payment, tds, whatsapp
